metadata.title: CVE-2021-23358 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The package underscore from 1.13.0-0 and before 1.13.0-2, from 1.3.2 and before 1.12.1 are vulnerable to Arbitrary Code Injection via the template function, particularly when a variable property is passed as an argument as it is not sanitized.

criterions.comment: underscore package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9.1~dfsg-1ubuntu0.21.04.1').
